website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice for users who are on a budget. The best value for your money.
pros: A streamlined mini fridge with similar features as other models, including a reversible door
This model stands out for its 8 color choices to match any decor
cons: Some users found that ice trays did not freeze completely when placed in the chiller compartment

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fridge for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love my new fridge!!! It fits under my desk and keeps everything nice and cold. I pulled the shelf out of my old fridge and put in in the new fridge for more storage space. The fridge looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Spontaneously combusts! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 13 months ago for my wife to use in her classroom ( pre-k teacher) and today while being out on leave due to a recent surgery, her aid notified her that it started smoking and had filled up the classroom with smoke! It was in the open with plenty of ventilation and nothing touching it and has been treated correctly since day one. Had this happened over the holiday or at night it could have caught fire and burned the school down. I'll never purchase an RCA product again and RCA should be ashamed of themselves! I'm thankful someone caught it in time! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Karson

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered upside down, Sat that way for ...
customer_reviews.text: I posted a bad review, only about the delivery of this fridge. Now that I have had it for a while its a great addition to my man cave. I wonder how I went so long without it. I keep my stuff in it and don't have to bother the family in the kitchen. Good quality and hope it last since it was delivered upside down and sat that way for 3 hours. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: After reading the negative reviews, I decided to take a chance. It dead in 1 month. Now I do believe the bad reviews :(
customer_reviews.author: L. Oliver Ouyang

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little fridge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little fridge to have for bedroom to keep beverage and some food. At the beginning, the order was made to deliver to my old address by mistake. I contacted the amazon customer service as soon as I found out, and the lady was very nice and replace the order right away. The fridge reached very fast. It is small enough to be kept in a corner. You can also keep it under a table just for convenience. It runs about every 15-20 minutes with not very loud noise. I am a light sleeper, but the noise does not bother me much in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara. Z

customer_reviews.title: Not what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not the advertised product. It is a fridge and works but smaller that the advertisement of what was purchased. went through having another one sent and that 2nd one is the same one as the first. Different logo in front and a 1.6 not 1.7 cf size. Not sure why the mistake but if i hd to guess it might be an older model that is shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RUN away from anythiing manufactured by Curtco.
customer_reviews.text: the product failed due to a worker kinking a coolant line. this falls under 90 day 'labor'. the manufacturer will not warranty the product. READ THE WARRANTY, then NEVER by a Curtco product: 1. The defective product should be mailed to: In the U.S.A. Curtis International Ltd. C/O Lotus International Company 6880 Commerce Blvd. Canton MI 48187 U.S.A. 5. 6. If mailing the product, the freight must be prepaid and a money order for $7.00 should be included to cover the cost of insurance and the return of the product. The money order must be made payable to Curtco International Ltd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny fridge with timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a relative who lives in a nursing home. Very happy with the small size. Smallest fridge I have seen ... which makes it perfect for our use. Seems to be working fine -- ice cream stay solid in the mini freezer. Shipping from the seller was fast. Hopefully the RCA brand brings quality.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Guy

customer_reviews.title: Temp control is off and leaks inside
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is okay but not the best. I went through several other fridges even name brand fridges and I ended up choosing this one based on reviews. So i have the temp on 5 bc 4 isn’t cold enough. The fridge leaks inside like water is always dripping from the freezer tray then the freezer tray has water that’s Iced so I assume at some pint the temp of fridge lowers on its own causing the leakage inside. It’s true for the door that the handles are flimsy so it does not hold water bottles like that
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little fridge. Does not make loud noises when compressor kicks on. I keep it under my desk at work. I never notice it running.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good size, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Good sized, showed up un-damaged, removed the packing tape from the inside, plugged 'er in, and it worked nicely. They include a drip and an ice-cube tray for added effect. Don't try finding the temperature control inside the fridge though - it's on the back over by the compressor....first time I've ever seen anything like that, but oh well. Next day the bottles of water were cooled off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed. I ordered this item with an adjustable thermostat control but it came without any control. Compressor makes weird sounds. Very quiet when compressor not on, but loud compressor for such a small fridge.
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Even the freezer works well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fridge!! I read the reviews and some say they weren't sure if the freezer would actually keep things frozen. Well let me tell you, it definitely does!! I needed it to keep some ice cool throughout the day to ice my back and after about two hours, I tried to pull a bag of half melted ice out and struggled to get it out because it had completely frozen back up into a the shape of the freezer! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Love already
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, I do admit the freezer door was a little unaligned and I had to pop that back into place, and the door on mine doesn't seem completely flush with the inside. So I have to kind of have to use more force but nothing too serious. It's awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Josh Little

customer_reviews.title: Roll the dice on shipping damage.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented in two places - one was because when they tightened the plastic shipping straps they went too far and actually bent the top corner of the fridge. The other was a casualty of UPS shipping - both minor but hey - you asked.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Great office/garage fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great office/garage fridge. I wanted the smallest fridge for my office and this is it. It easily fits a few lunch meat packages and about three 6-packs (soft drinks, of course). Plus a nice little freezer area. If you want small, yet effective, this is your fridge.
customer_reviews.author: AA8

customer_reviews.title: A perfect little fridge for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The name on the fridge is igloo famous for coolers and thermoses, this fits perfectly under my desk in my bedroom, so late at night I Don't have to walk into the kitchen and I'm disabled. I've had it running for 24 hours everything is cool but I do find the compressor and a little bit too annoying when it goes on for my bedroom but I'll get used of it, as of yet not made ice.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD FUSEY

customer_reviews.title: No temperature control.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that there is no temperature control inside, as stated in the description. Packaging was unbelievably poor. Missing parts of the cardboard and tape everywhere. Was scratched and dented. Would have sent it back if we were putting it where anyone would see it, but it works and we needed it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Item was damaged during shipment
customer_reviews.text: This product was damaged during shipment/delivery and there is a smashed corner on the rear back of the refrigerator. I needed this for my mother who is in a nursing home and wanted to have something to cool her diabetic drinks. I'm not sure if there is any fault with the unit - it seemed to cool off when I delivered it to her room but the bent corner is somewhat evident. I have taken a photo of what is wrong and included it in this summary. Please advise what can be done, if anything.
customer_reviews.author: brenda johnson

customer_reviews.title: Small but cool!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and undamaged, keeps temp very well. Only issue is the gurgling noise the freon makes as it circulates but it is quiet and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.author: Austin tx

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad for the price. My only complaint is that the temperature is different in different spots. The freezer takes a long time to freeze items but the spot directly under the freezer causes ice to build up on anything I put there. Then the bottom shelf is barely cold at all. It's good for an ice tray and a couple of drinks, but if you're looking to store anything else in there, get a more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I just bought this fridge for my office and so ...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this fridge for my office and so far I would say, it is definitely NOT QUIET. It is making a light buzzing sound every time the 'engine' is working. I think if noise if a factor, skip this fridge and find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Good, although may break during shipping
customer_reviews.text: The main problem that this fridge seems to have is that it breaks during shipping. The one I ordered had one of its feet shattered before I received it, although it still works fine. This particular fridge is just big enough to fit 3 half gallons of milk and a few short items. A little on the small side, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: SAwale

customer_reviews.title: Great for the nursery.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to store pre-made bottles each night in our daughter's nursery to save us from walking across the house to the kitchen, which would wake me and baby up more than necessary, with turning on lights, etc. This does the job, perfectly. It's not too large, nor does it kick on loud, which was a concern as we have a light little sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miceli

customer_reviews.title: Small, quiet, and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit skeptical of the power of minifridges in general, but when I plugged this little cube in and set the dial to 4, I had the perfect freezing cold temperature for cans of soda and the included icetray was frozen within 3ish hours. I'm extremely happy with how it turned out, I watch a lot of films in my room so having a place to get cold drinks for my friends and I without having to pause or miss some of the movie is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Freezer keeps melting
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this fridge for 3 months now and the freezer keeps melting and refreezing; getting water all over everything. The water gets in the floor when the door is opened. It has always been in setting 6 and just turned it up to 7. Hoping that helps...bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: It gets cold, good amount of space blah, blah. I have mine in a decently large office, and it is noisy and annoying. I do not recomend putting it in an office or room that is in close proximity to you.
customer_reviews.author: Will B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and needed!!
customer_reviews.text: This came in record time and no mine was not dented. It was in perfect shape and fits wonderfully in my spare bedroom. Great perk is that I realized you can use the dry erase neon markers on this model as well without paying double for the other one advertised. I am so happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Renee Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little fridge! I love RCA products. I've had RCA products since I was little. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: April Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Damaged unit arrived.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived in a well.packaged box with no visible signs of damage. After unpacking the unit I found many scratches to the top, sides and front with no apparent reason for the damage. The unit started and chilled properly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge
customer_reviews.text: So this has lasted just fine for months so far, and feel confident if something does happen we can get help from tech... works great for me, and holds a decent bit of food. really quiet, and a nice reversible door design.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Fine fridge, cheap, and with only minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Quiet enough, keeps things cool. "Freezer" section a bit off, like with most of these little fridges. The frost tends to melt but they designed a little tray to catch the drips, so it doesn't really make a mess in the fridge itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It's a happy little fridge
customer_reviews.text: After having it for about 2 years it still works like a charm. great for snacks and drinks. however if you tap the temperature control dial slightly it will freeze anything you have in there. Very delicate, but a good mini fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my office space
customer_reviews.text: It arrived branded RCA actually. Im sure they rebrand it to different companies. Perfect for my office space! fits neatly under my cube desk and saving a great deal of money by not eating out for lunch as often. Already paid for itself. -B
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The Caddilac of mini-fridges at a rock bottom price.
customer_reviews.text: The price is right and the fridge works well. I put mine out in my garage. I can put 14 bottles of beer in the fridge with room to spare. A must have for any man cave or private office.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Nice n Cool
customer_reviews.text: Good working for the size fridge. Need to allow for more warm up time if item is in fridge for a long time without ridge being open.
customer_reviews.author: Olimpia McCall

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: A great fridge for my office. Works great with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: There are some marks above the mini fridge which makes it look like used; may be caused by transportation
customer_reviews.text: The Dip Tray wasn't there but only the lid. Irritating! There are some marks above the mini fridge which makes it look like used; may be caused by transportation. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Karan

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect for my aunt who lives in an assisted living place. She loves her Pepsi!!
customer_reviews.author: janet horner

customer_reviews.title: Great product and affordable as well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters sleep away camp, had a adjustable cold setting in the rear next to the compressor, easy to carry and works well. Easy to clean and looks well made, was worried for the price it would be flimsy or made with cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Leizerson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Assisted Living!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my dad to use in his assisted living facility for the few refrigerated items he uses. It's perfect for this!
customer_reviews.author: Savivi

customer_reviews.title: it's cool, but not cold
customer_reviews.text: Seems to keep things cool but not cold like most mini fridges
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Bad Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Why I’ve had to mini fridge for a little over 2 months. I am passed the window to return it. I got it while I was battling coronavirus. It leaks water and does not get cold enough. I am dissatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lavon Smith

customer_reviews.title: its just okay not much room on the inside that ...
customer_reviews.text: its just okay not much room on the inside that you would assume. The interior space is small due to the exterior components and the ice box leaks often. When you put it to high to prevent it from leaking it just turns into a large icicle.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Bad birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this this is even gonna work. Top is scratched, and the bottom looks like it has been styrofoam sprayed. Bought it for my husband's birthday, so far not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Ok, Not Great.
customer_reviews.text: The temp control is in the back, hence difficult to reach. The door has spaces for water, sodas, etc, but the retaining rod poorly designed, so the bottles will fly off when the door is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Tav Books

customer_reviews.title: Fridge did not work well
customer_reviews.text: After using this fridge for a month, it was not working correctly. It would get cold, then defrost, then cold again and defrost, etc. I had to throw food out a few times. Contacted support. They could not fix it. So, they gladly gave me a refund. So, be careful on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: just cool. Freezer section doesn't freeze ice
customer_reviews.text: doesn't really get cold, just cool. Freezer section doesn't freeze ice. I had a couple of items grow mold over a 2 day period while i was out of town. Tried returning unit, but it isn't returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I have to say that this is loud enough to be annoying. If it was a constant sound it might ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple weeks in my office. I'm not especially fussy, but I have to say that this is loud enough to be annoying. If it was a constant sound it might be better but this is like liquid gurgling through the system each time it kicks on. If everything else wasn't just as proposed, I'd have rated 3 stars instead of 4. (My home refrigerator makes less noise.)
customer_reviews.author: Damon H.

customer_reviews.title: Where's the temp control?
customer_reviews.text: It's a good mini for my partners office. Only this is it had a dent. Other than that it was a good buy. Dent is on backside. We'll live ;) Oh and no temp control. ??
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great Lil Frig
customer_reviews.text: Love my lil frig! It's quiet, fits nicely in a corner in my befroom and holds just enough items to keep me happy. It arrived quickly with NO damage, NO dents. It keeps my drinks very cold, and the freezer is colder than I expected. So far, I have no issues with my lil frig.
customer_reviews.author: MzDreadlock

customer_reviews.title: These units do not ship well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these units and BOTH came in dented and damaged. They are cheap and I don't really have time to return them, so I will likely keep them, but WOW are they beat up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed during the busiest time of the year for us
customer_reviews.text: Quit working EXACTLY 30 days after we received. Very disappointed during the busiest time of the year for us, it just stopped and we had to throw out everything in it! Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Pixcm

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a ZERO star if possible! This fridge is garbage and the company who warranties it is HORRIBLE. You will get NO response. Look at the Better Business Beareau reviews. Everyone has the same problem with Curtis International.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Its noisy and will only last a few months
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my office and 6 months later the compressor is out and im told its cheaper to buy a new one that to get it fixed. Garbage! It makes an annoying noise while plugged it, so not good for an office setting..Everyone coming into my office would ask "whats that sound".
customer_reviews.author: Kielia

customer_reviews.title: Freezer doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking little frig. Keeps things cold enough. Freezer does not freeze anything. Bought early for a gift so time passed...could not return.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cold, but a bit noisey.
customer_reviews.text: A little noisy, but it keeps things cold! Decent amount of room. Freezer compartment definitely works. Rail on door doesn't stop items from falling out. Otherwise a nice purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. It doesn’t have temperature control knobs and freezer doesn’t work. I have to empty water from the basin every other day. What s disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine F Wood

customer_reviews.title: The unit works fine. It was scratched by the foam packing and ...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is awful. The unit works fine. It was scratched by the foam packing and both rubber feet we're broken. I am speaking replacement feet from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: flc

customer_reviews.title: Lame duck
customer_reviews.text: Worked less than 6 weeks and died. No longer gets cold at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok not Great
customer_reviews.text: Fine as fridge but freezer not cold enough to keep food solid
customer_reviews.author: drmoore

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE PIECE OF TRASH !
customer_reviews.text: PIECE OF GARBAGE- very noisy very inaccurate web description. WOULD NOT EVER BUY AGAIN and non returnable to boot ! Threw in the garbage one day after purchase
customer_reviews.author: Neal G.

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge with minor set backs
customer_reviews.text: Freezer part is small and for reason mine filled up with ice about a month of using it (nothing was in it) It does it job keeps things cold although it’s pretty loud
customer_reviews.author: Journey Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well for storing milk
customer_reviews.text: We used this fridge for a few months and it started to leak and didn’t keep milk I had pumped for the baby cold so it spoiled. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rfsteele

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my son and it lasted 4 months. The motor burned out on it. Don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working great. Quiet and compact
customer_reviews.text: Working great. Quiet and compact. Fits in a tight corner. Defrosting maybe be needed more often. No adjustable control as indicated in the product detail However it keeps temp in cold without it. Less interference. The size may not require it.
customer_reviews.author: Will Mason

customer_reviews.title: ... a nursing home she loves it and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who lives in a nursing home she loves it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit loud, and not very big, ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit loud, and not very big, but does it's job quite well. I sleep with in the room w/ me, the only time it became an issue was when I went on a trip and came back and noticed how loud it was.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wxly

customer_reviews.title: good compact fridge
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Only confusing part was that the cooling controls are on the outside back of the unit. Arrived just as advertised and within the time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Meade

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is the door rack. Could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mudrick

customer_reviews.title: I named mine Jim
customer_reviews.text: It's got decent storage space and is still pretty small, kinda heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Atsu-Waffles

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it worked, other times it did not (mostly ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it worked, other times it did not (mostly did not). Ruined everything inside the fridge by basically turning off multiple times. Never worked from day one. Go a different route.
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well while it was working, but completely stopped working altogether 7 months after purchase. Sadly, it'll cost more to ship back to fix than what I paid. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge, great price, and SILENT!
customer_reviews.text: This little fridge does exactly what you would want and expect. Keeps drinks VERY cold and it is EXTREMELY QUIET! (every now and then you hear a quiet little "click" but otherwise virtually silent) I've only had it a few weeks but very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: OptimusLibri

customer_reviews.title: Good for my office
customer_reviews.text: Good little fridge. Keeps the good cold, is quiet, and small enough to be inconspicuous.
customer_reviews.author: Southernsocialworker

customer_reviews.title: Great for the bedroom, maybe for college
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter Beyonce was really surprised! I had her wrap it up for me, not knowing it was for her😘
customer_reviews.author: jamie valentino ( Nana)

customer_reviews.title: ... to put in my room and it was an easy set up and was light enough for me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fridge to put in my room and it was an easy set up and was light enough for me to carry on my own.it has been in my room since Christmas and hasn't gave me any problems.it is Quiet and doesn't give me any problems when I go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Tfrancesca

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it has been used lots of scratches and dings.
customer_reviews.author: Amanada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my wife for her office, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons room to store a small amount of items he likes to have with him, especially in the evening, as well as keep his medications that need to be refrigerated, close by. Working very well. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Vinals

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: Just received the other day....seems to be just fine...lets see how time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Debra shumate

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but little freezer box drips into fridge space...
customer_reviews.author: M. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Small fridge
customer_reviews.text: Cute little fridge! Worth the price. Cools drinks quickly so don’t turn it all the way up! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with product
customer_reviews.text: My refrigerator was dented box all tore up I have pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upset
customer_reviews.text: Came in with dent on side. Didn't return it because it works. But that isn't good..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. At times it makes noise
customer_reviews.text: Works great. At times it makes noise, but not too long.
customer_reviews.author: Daffney Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fridge stopped working 5 weeks after purchasing, and the return window already closed. Don’t waste your money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Freedom C.

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a few months I can say we love it!
customer_reviews.text: Having had this for a few months I can say we love it!
customer_reviews.author: April Muller

customer_reviews.title: ... of my tool box at work and it works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I set it on top of my tool box at work and it works great so far
customer_reviews.author: william d hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Fridge seems to work well but it was pretty banged up right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Fridge seems to work well but it was pretty banged up right out of the box. There are scratches and dents all over it.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fridges and after six months neither works. I can’t get ahold of the seller either. Stay away at all cost.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Metal was torn which was 1 inch but its fine. Please be aware with the shippers
customer_reviews.text: I had a mark on my fridge. The box was also torn. Metal was torn which was 1 inch but its fine. Please be aware with the shippers.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received with a dent where it seems it was dropped. Would return but I don't want to wait another 3 weeks. Hope you could discount for the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, perfect small size for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Revised review after 30 days use... Even on the coldest setting, mine still will not freeze ice, and barely keeps ice cream frozen.. returning ====== Works... some noise but not bad, I have next to my bed so its real quiet. The freezer part barely works unless almost on coldest setting, and when it is, then drinks etc freeze.. so its pretty touchy. Havent seen ANY frost buildup on the frezer part, but maybe since not cold enough? not sure. But so far so good.. We will see how long it lasts. Good for the price, perfect small size for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: As with any fridge or good grade coller keep the door/lid closed and minimal opening.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the water and beer cold and will freeze in the small chamber.

customer_reviews.text: great fridge, works like inteded. When i opened the box the front door was dented and the top had scuffs. other than that great product

customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fridge. I have mine in the office and it is quiet and keeps my food handy.

product_meta.title: RCA RFR115-BLACK 1.7 Cubic Foot Fridge, Black
product_meta.description:
RCA's latest 1.6 Cubic Foot refrigerator is perfect for your college dorm room, bed room, office, and any place you need a compact fridge to keep your food and beverages cold. The fridge is CFC free and has a built in accurate adjustable thermostat so you can keep your food and drinks at the perfect temperature. RCA's 1.6 cu. ft. fridge is compressor cooled, meaning it will perform well no matter what the outside and inside temperature is! Within the fridge there is a freezer compartment. The sides of the door sport a very convenient 2 Liter bottle holder. With a space saving flush back design and a clever reversible door that allows you to open the fridge to the right or the left, you can safely and conveniently place this fridge in any spot! If you are looking for a quality fridge at an affordable price, look no further, this RCA fridge made with decades of experience is one of the most popular on the market and will be perfect for your needs.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
RCA's latest 1.6 Cubic Foot refrigerator is perfect for your college dorm room, bed room, office, and any place you need a compact fridge to keep your food and beverages cold. The fridge is CFC free and has a built in accurate adjustable thermostat so you can keep your food and drinks at the perfect temperature. RCA's 1.6 cu. ft. fridge is compressor cooled, meaning it will perform well no matter what the outside and inside temperature is! Within the fridge there is a freezer compartment. The sides of the door sport a very convenient 2 Liter bottle holder. With a space saving flush back design and a clever reversible door that allows you to open the fridge to the right or the left, you can safely and conveniently place this fridge in any spot! If you are looking for a quality fridge at an affordable price, look no further, this RCA fridge made with decades of experience is one of the most popular on the market and will be perfect for your needs.
feature_bullets: 1.6 Cubic Foot Mini Fridge (Black). Neoprene material is ideal for drink insulation
Adjustable Thermostat and Compressor Cooling for ultimate performance even in hot weather
Space Saving Flush Back Design,Reversible Door (Allows for Right or Left Opening)
Door Basket for 2 Liter Bottles; Ice Cube Chamber with Tray,Low energy consumption
NOTE:The temperature control is in the rear of the fridge in the bottom right corner.
